The Quranic researcher sees them from the rest of any resting place that the rest is a name like the rest, not a description, and the time to transfer to the heaven For the ethnicity, Ibn Al -Anbari said, that is, the remaining, the distraction for the exaggeration, and it is permissible to be a source like the tyrant and the liar, that is, a meeting and the purity of the one.
